title: Office of Health Equity works to vaccinate minority populations lagging behind
author: Parris Kane
description: The Office of Health Equity at the Arkansas Department of Health is making a major push to get minority populations vaccinated for COVID-19. Recent data from the ADH shows minority races are falling behind in vaccines. Right now in Arkansas, about 77. 5 percent of those vaccinated are white. Race of individuals fully vaccinated vs Arkansas population estimate(Arkansas Department of Health)
